CustomField.formula: IF( NotaEsportivaA1__c < 13, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Z00000037TXB", "green", 30, 30), IF( NotaEsportivaA1__c > 12 && NotaEsportivaA1__c < 30, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Z00000037TXG", "yellow", 30, 30), IF( NotaEsportivaA1__c > 29 && NotaEsportivaA1__c < 47 , IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Z00000037TXL", "orange", 30, 30), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Z00000037TXQ", "blue", 30, 30) )))
